languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, с Кьявы Гамма пришло загадочное сообщение. Фабрикатор-Цензор докладывает, что они "узрели Око Бога". Я запросил подробности у ваших менее... религиозных слуг, и они донесли, что группа дознания, расследовавшая многие имевшие на планете необъяснимые события, пошла по следу загадочных бинарных гармоник и наткнулась на древний заброшенный инфокомплекс. Он связан с мануфакторумами лабиринтом коммуникационных линий и содержит в себе гигантский инфостанок. Маркировка показывает, что он называется... нет, что его зовут грозным именем Ноль-Халиф".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

languages.text: “大人，基亚瓦伽马星发来了一条神秘信息。铸造审查师报告说，他们‘看到了神明之眼’。我要求您那些……不怎么虔诚的仆人做出详细解释。他们澄清说，勘探小组一直在调查行星上那些无法解释的事件，他们沿着一条神秘的二进制和声的痕迹，发现了一台被废弃的古老数据综合体。它通过迷宫般的通信线路与制造工厂相连，其中包含一台巨型数据梭机。这台机械的标记表明，它的头衔……或者我应该说，它那颇具威胁性的名字，叫‘虚无哈里发’。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

traits.locale_text: “大人，基亚瓦伽马星发来了一条神秘信息。铸造审查师报告说，他们‘看到了神明之眼’。我要求您那些……不怎么虔诚的仆人做出详细解释。他们澄清说，勘探小组一直在调查行星上那些无法解释的事件，他们沿着一条神秘的二进制和声的痕迹，发现了一台被废弃的古老数据综合体。它通过迷宫般的通信线路与制造工厂相连，其中包含一台巨型数据梭机。这台机械的标记表明，它的头衔……或者我应该说，它那颇具威胁性的名字，叫‘虚无哈里发’。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ha llegado un mensaje críptico de Kiava Gamma. El fabricator-censor informa que han "contemplado el Ojo de lo Divino". Pedí detalles a sus... sirvientes menos devotos, y me aclararon que el grupo de investigación, que ha estado estudiando los muchos sucesos inexplicables que han tenido lugar en el planeta, siguió un rastro de misteriosos armónicos binarios y dio con un antiguo complejo de datos abandonado. Está conectado al manufactorum por un laberinto de líneas de comunicación y contiene un gigantesco telar de datos. Las marcas del mecanismo muestran que su designación es Null Caliph. El nombre, desde luego, no augura nada bueno».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

Pedí detalles a sus... sirvientes menos devotos, y me aclararon que el grupo de investigación, que ha estado estudiando los muchos sucesos inexplicables que han tenido lugar en el planeta, siguió un rastro de misteriosos armónicos binarios y dio con un antiguo complejo de datos abandonado. Está conectado al manufactorum por un laberinto de líneas de comunicación y contiene un gigantesco telar de datos. Las marcas del mecanismo muestran que su designación es Null Caliph. El nombre, desde luego, no augura nada bueno».

languages.text: 「陛下、キアヴァ・ガンマから暗号のメッセージが届きました。ファブリケーター・センサーは '神の目を見た 'と報告しています。あなたの...敬虔とは言えない従者に詳細を求めたところ、彼らは検死集団についてのことを明らかにしました。その集団は惑星で起きている不可解な出来事の数々を調査し、謎めいた2進法の音の痕跡をたどり、古代の放棄されたデータ施設を発見しました。それは聖工場と迷路のような通信回線で接続されており、巨大なデータ・ルームが含まれています。機構についてるマークには、その名称が...というか、その脅威の名前とでも言うべきか...ヌル・カリフと示されています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、キアヴァ・ガンマから暗号のメッセージが届きました。ファブリケーター・センサーは '神の目を見た 'と報告しています。あなたの...敬虔とは言えない従者に詳細を求めたところ、彼らは検死集団についてのことを明らかにしました。その集団は惑星で起きている不可解な出来事の数々を調査し、謎めいた2進法の音の痕跡をたどり、古代の放棄されたデータ施設を発見しました。それは聖工場と迷路のような通信回線で接続されており、巨大なデータ・ルームが含まれています。機構についてるマークには、その名称が...というか、その脅威の名前とでも言うべきか...ヌル・カリフと示されています」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, un message crypté nous est parvenu de Kiava Gamma. Le fabricator-censeur rapporte avoir "contemplé l'Œil du Divin". Après avoir demandé un complément d'information à certains de vos serviteurs moins... fervents, j'ai appris que le groupe chargé d'enquêter sur les événements inexplicables ayant frappé la planète avait suivi la piste de mystérieuses harmonies binhaires, jusqu'à un antique infocomplexe abandonné. Il est relié au manufactorum par un labyrinthe de lignes de communication et abrite un gigantesque concentrateur de données. Les sceaux du mécanisme indiquent une référence, ou devrais-je plutôt dire, un nom menaçant : Null Caliph. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

Après avoir demandé un complément d'information à certains de vos serviteurs moins... fervents, j'ai appris que le groupe chargé d'enquêter sur les événements inexplicables ayant frappé la planète avait suivi la piste de mystérieuses harmonies binhaires, jusqu'à un antique infocomplexe abandonné. Il est relié au manufactorum par un labyrinthe de lignes de communication et abrite un gigantesque concentrateur de données. Les sceaux du mécanisme indiquent une référence, ou devrais-je plutôt dire, un nom menaçant : Null Caliph. »

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, eine kryptische Botschaft hat uns von Kiava Gamma erreicht. Der Fabricator-Zensor berichtet, dass sie 'das Auge des Göttlichen erblickt' haben. Ich habe Details von Euren ... weniger frommen Dienern erbeten. Offenbar hat die Gruppe, welche die vielen unerklärlichen Ereignisse auf dem Planeten untersucht, die Spur mysteriöser binhärer Harmonien zurückverfolgt und ist dabei auf einen uralten, verlassenen Datenkomplex gestoßen. Er ist durch ein Labyrinth von Kommunikationsleitungen mit dem Manufactorum verbunden und enthält einen gigantischen Datenwebstuhl. Den Markierungen auf dem Mechanismus zufolge lautet seine ID — oder besser gesagt sein recht bedrohlicher Name — Null Caliph."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Kiava Gama'dan esrarengiz bir mesaj geldi. Denetçi Fabrikatör, 'Ulvi'nin Gözü'ne şahitlik ettiğini bildirmiş. Mütedeyyinliği... Nispeten noksan olan hizmetkârlarınızdan teferruat iletmelerini istedim, onlar da gezegendeki akıl almaz hadiseleri incelemekte olan soruşturmacıların tuhaf ikilidil ezgilerini takip ederek kadim ve harap bir veri kompleksine ulaştığını söyledi. İletişim hatlarından oluşan bir labirentle manufaktoruma bağlanmış, içinde de devasa bir veri tezgâhı varmış. Üstündeki işaretlerde ismi, daha doğrusu nispeten göz korkutan namı yazıyormuş: Hiçlik Halifesi."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, a cryptic message arrived from Kiava Gamma. The Fabricator-Censor reports that they have 'beheld the Eye of the Divine.' I requested details from your... less devout servants, and they clarified that the inquest group, which has been investigating the many inexplicable events that have taken place on the planet, followed a trail of mysterious binharic harmonics and came upon an ancient and abandoned data-complex. It is connected to the manufactorum by a maze of communication lines and contains a gargantuan data-loom. The mechanism's markings show that its designation — or, I should say, its rather menacing name — is Null Caliph."
